sentences.sContent: ...silk and satin in every shade of the rainbow.
sentences.sCn: …如彩虹般五颜六色的丝绸与锦缎。

synos.tran: [气象]彩虹；五彩缤纷的排列；幻想

phrases.pCn: 虹桥（美国犹他州南部天然拱形石桥）

remMethod.val: rain(雨) ＋ bow(弓) → 雨后天边出现如弓的彩虹 → 彩虹

trans.tranOther: a large curve of different colours that can appear in the sky when there is both sun and rain
